ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name != 'Data Loader Profile', RecordType.Name == 'Global Alliance', Text(Accreditation_Type__c) == 'Product', OR( AND(Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Alliance Partner', NOT( OR(Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Authorized', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Expert', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = '')) ),Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'No Accreditation') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the following values are allowed: Alliance Partner
